title: On the stochastic selection of integral curves of a rough vector field
abstract:
We prove that for bounded, divergence-free vector fields b in
L^1_{loc}((0,1];BV(\T^d;\R^d)), there exists a unique incompressible measure on
integral curves of b. We recall the vector field constructed by Depauw in
[Depauw, C. R. Math. Acad. Sci. Paris, 2003], which lies in the above class,
and prove that for this vector field, the unique incompressible measure on
integral curves exhibits stochasticity.
